title: My Husband Is Not A Good Cheater
itunes:title: My Husband Is Not A Good Cheater
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, my husband and I have been married for almost 30 years. We both have professional jobs and we make a good living. My husband is genuinely a good guy but he’s also a big time cheater. The first time he cheated on me, I was pregnant with our oldest child. I forgave him then because I was young and pregnant, but years later, I found out he was still cheating. I let it slide again and things just kind of went back to normal. Over the years, I have confronted him about his inappropriate contact with women...............

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
